column4: I need to install apache 2.2.10 for PCI compliance, is compiling from source my only option?
and if I do compile apache 2.2.10, how do I make it as ubuntu-like as possible?
Unless you can find a deb somewhere, yes.  Intrepid has 2.2.9
this PCI compliance thing is _insane_, I have to use 2.2.10 :(
